website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice in terms of ruggedness and looks, although the fragility of the bulbs should be taken into account when hanging these lights.
pros: We love how these lights have a high-end industrial look and feel, up to and including the heavy-duty cable
Gives off a soft, bright light
cons: The fragile bulbs are the weak point here
We recommend that you remove them from the string before installation, then screw them back in afterwards

customer_reviews.title: Brighttech should shorten the pig tails and make this product better..
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem linking 3 strings together, the bulbs are set at 36 inches apart and the pig tails are also 36 inches long when you plug them together a 6 foot gap between bulbs looks awful. One option is bundle up the wire and make a wad of wire that looks awful or cut and solder the wires witch weakens the string. The instructions say i can link 10 strings, thats a lot of extra wire to mess with. Brighttech should shorten the pig tails and make this product better..
customer_reviews.author: mike mutzig

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!  Bought one then bought another due to how awesome they are!
customer_reviews.text: Can I give it 10 stars? These light are AWESOME! I bought these for my remote cabin. I bought one set for the covered porch. We use a generator for power and have to be careful how much power we use. I read that they use about 1 watt each and had my doubts how they would look . I was pleasantly surprised that they are VERY bright and give a great vintage look. We loved them so much, we ordered another set. The wire and plugs are made out of very rugged wire. These are quality for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Impressed: Nice Warm Light
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 strings of these up on my patio and love them. They have a nice warm light that puts out the right amount of light for the area. This string has the bulbs placed every three feet where other strings have them every two feet. This was a concern to begin with, but where I strung them it became a non-issue. It is heavy-duty outdoor cord - good for leaving out all year long but does add a little weight when hanging (each string is 7-8 pounds). I've added a photo with the lights just before dark. There's a light on the house near the door that is a cold white which you could use for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stuber

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Good ambient light and looks decorative. They may be a little bright for low-light ambience and I will try them on a dimmer as suggested in other reviews. UPDATE: I got a two sets of these lights, and then also got these dimmers (Leviton TBL03-10E Tabletop Slide Control Lamp Dimmer)  Even though the dimmers are for interior use, the area I have the lights outdoors is mostly protected. The dimmers work pretty well with these string lights although it is not a complete dimming (about 1/3 the light intensity of the full-on). There is no noticeable hum from the lights with these dimmers, but outdoor sounds (gentle breeze in the leaves, etc) may mask that if there is any sound.
customer_reviews.author: holz

customer_reviews.title: exceptionally designed product
customer_reviews.text: When used as intended, this are pretty much bullet proof. In the past I used a string of filament bulbs at my business in the outdoor cafe area, and they were always burning out, or the fuse in the string would burn. After I switched to LED type, they are maintenance free. The string and sockets are VERY heavy duty, at least compared to the old style I used for years. This is my second string (adding a string to the first one), so I've been using these for 6 months or so. 0 issues, 0 burnt bulbs, 0 toasted fuses (I don't even know if they have a fuse), and they look great
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware of Wide Spacing of Lights - 36”
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. Heavy duty construction looks as though it will hold up outdoors; have not used them yet. The devil is in the details... while Brightech accurately describes the size of the lights and length of the strands - admittedly, I should have read the fine print. To achieve the look shown in some of their promotional photos, you would need to overlap and stagger 2-3 strands. I have two longer strands purchased from another company, and those lights are 18” apart - compared to 36” for these. I like the other ones better. 3’ is too wide apart for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want a bright light!
customer_reviews.text: The pros are that these lights really are heavy duty and bright! I consider it a con that the description says “dimmable” but I didn’t read the fine print which states you have to have a dimmer to do that. They are far too bright for my intended purpose but I will find a use for them. I was shocked at first to see there are only 7 bulbs on the string that I bought but after I turned them on, it’s certainly bright enough for any purpose. I feel the write up could be a little more explanatory and I would have chosen different lights with a much softer glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kookie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality. These corded lights were very supple and easy to work with. I actually ran a plastic-coated cable through the molded eyelets for additional hanging support. I bought three sets and hooked them all together making a triangle with three 50-foot sides. Every LED bulb worked flawlessly when screwed into bases. My outdoor picnic area with LP firepit has now become usefully both day and night. The ambience value was well worth the cost and effort. Lots of positive comments by our guests. Very happy with the purchase and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hunter

customer_reviews.title: and intended for outside on my windy patio and it's great that they have withstood the ocean wind that moves ...
customer_reviews.text: The lights are very strong and secure, and intended for outside on my windy patio and it's great that they have withstood the ocean wind that moves things around quite a bit. My only comment is that I hate that the lightbulbs included are daylight bright (think office space, kitchen - bright). I wish they came with warm bulbs since it's likely intended use is for a relaxing outdoor space and I used to be able to sit out there for hours and enjoy the nice weather, and it's hard to spend 20 minutes when the bulbs are that bright.
customer_reviews.author: Vesna

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I attached these lights to a thin wire rope spanning two trees -about 20' apart and 15' high. The lights have been up for three months and have survived high winds, several days of rain and a little bit of snow. The light output is decent considering each bulb only pulls one watt. They are turned on every night and are turned off after sunrise. I'm very happy with this product and recommend it. My only complaint is that the color temperature is not as warm as it should be -to my eye they appear to be between 3200K and 4000K.
customer_reviews.author: Pep Streebek

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor lighting
customer_reviews.text: Box was received with moderate damage, that being said all bulbs and lighting strand works perfectly.. Right off the bat I’m overly impressed with the quality as the box was damaged during shipping and wasn’t sent in an Amazon box but just the original box from factory with my mailing address attached. They are bright enough to light the area we bought them for and look very well made. Will update in a couple of months to make sure they work as good as they look. I rarely review something from Amazon however these are impressive to say the least.. R. Henley
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henley

customer_reviews.title: Solid, bright string of patio lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. We were surprised (because my husband didn't read the listing closely) that there were only 7 bulbs in this string, but because they are LEDs they are plenty bright to give nice lighting to our balcony. We had a couple of challenges installing them because our old hooks were sized for a normal christmas light style cord, and this cord is much thicker, but these seem to be a well-made set and we hope they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: sillygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very very bright but the product is heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when i got the box delivered as it was heavy. Sure enough i hung it and an hour later i hear a crash and one string pulled the hook off, shattering a bulb, scratching my glass slider. If you are looking for a very bright light or for a large space, this is what you are looking for, just be sure to have hooks that hold several lbs. i reordered fairy lights. The bulbs were way too bright for my 200 sq ft lanai...
customer_reviews.author: E. Duell

customer_reviews.title: Brightech is a good name.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well named because they are bright! I have a very small house but it has front and back covered porches with open rafters. I use those as extended living spaces so I like them to be well lit at night. Brightech's Edison style LED strings have really charming old style bulbs that throw plenty of light and don't get hot. The glass globes won't yellow or dull in the weather as well. I used a 48 foot string in front and a 24 foot one in back. Since the reviews said the 1 watt strings were plenty bright and I didn't plan on using a dimmer, I went with those.
customer_reviews.author: Aquila Chrysaetos

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lights
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - they are brighter than expected, but give such a warm and cozy feeling to the area - I hung a set on my screened porch, and I also hung 2 sets along my privacy fence. Everyone who has seen the transformation has complimented us on how fabulous they look. I was going to hang 3 sets along the fence, but 2 were plenty bright enough. So now I have a spare set that I've got to decide where I want it, lol. Oh, I also used remote control timers - that makes it very convenient to turn off and on for just when I want them.
customer_reviews.author: ReidalongTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than the similar lights sold by the large membership store
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes to hang from the fence in my backyard and around my little workshop and storage house in the backyard. I read the reviews about similar lights from membership stores that don’t work out of the box. Brightech lights work straight out of the box. The lights can be dimmed (bought a dimmer) and it made the back yard look very pretty. I would recommend Brightech instead of the cheaper other brand that doesn’t work all the time, even though Brightech costs a bit more. In this case, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yue

customer_reviews.title: Blinding
customer_reviews.text: We wanted some nice LEDs for our front porch and were kind of skeptical of the price of these but liked the heavy-duty look so we could leave them up year round. After installing on our porch and turning the lights on, we couldn't believe how bright they were! These lights wrap around the whole deck and provide probably the same amount of light as if we were inside. I am able to read a book outside with just these lights on and they are very cool looking too. We were very impressed with these an will buy again for the back. Installation was a cinch as we just screwed them on the underside of our railing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina!

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a remote control like the review asked so not sure about that, but I ordered these for our patio, i wanted lights to create a romantic glow. Well these are definitely not it. They are bulky and so heavy, the light is not a warm ambiance, it's like freaking bright white blinding light that kills your eyes. Really not relaxing at all. Maybe for an outdoor event sure, but not for normal everyday backyard relaxing. Completely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Will Preston

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the short length as I wasn't sure what I would get. Well, top quality and LED...nice. I got the 2watt bulbs and I recommend the 1watt version if you only want ambiance or 2watt may be ok if lights will be way up high. I had to move these off my patio and put in the tree outside the patio as they were too bright...and I can still eat dinner by them. Now they are perfect. Love them, will get longer size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro

customer_reviews.title: This is the REAL Heavy Duty String - dont be fooled by look alikes from 3rd party vendors
customer_reviews.text: Ordered another identical Bright Ambience Pro from amazon, and got an unboxed set of look alikes that was extremely poor quality. Was glad when this one arrived and was just what is described: Commercial duty wiring, bulbs and connectors. Everything was in Brightech box, and install was easy. Everything is working, and looks great on patio. The wiring on this looks like 12ga; like a better outdoor extension cord. Very happy with this one, and it came directly from Brightech, not a third party vendor.
customer_reviews.author: psheps

customer_reviews.title: Heads up on installation
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than one strip of lights, it's very important to carefully tape the two sections together during the installation process with something like black Gorilla tape. This way, when you pull the cords during the installation process, they won't come apart. If they do and the string of lights crash to the ground, the light bulbs will all break. You'd be wise to install withOUT the bulbs in place.
customer_reviews.author: GaMountainGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice light set
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted something to put up in the Gazebo for nice nights and these worked out very well. Quality seems to be very good. Good brightness without being too bright. Bulbs are 1watt each so uses very little electricity. The instructions say you can connect up to 120 sets together, that would be a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: W. T. Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Good lights but beware
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very high quality and very bright! However, though the cable is 24 feet long there are only SEVEN (7) total lights on it. I bought these to add more lighting to our new pergola and in spite of their brightness, it seems wasteful to only have 7 lights on a cable this long. The spacing between the lights seems very disproportionate to the total length of it. They could easily add 5 more lights to this thing to make it better. But having said that, they high quality and the bulbs do give off good light. I’d give 5 stars if they had more lights and better spacing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your outdoor decorations.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two sets for our backyard. Very impressed with the construction. Heavy gauge wire and the design affords several options for stringing the lights and mounting the solar panel. For our yard in Florida, the lights normally stay on about 6 - 7 hours depending on the sun that day. The lights are bright, more a soft glow which we find pleasing when we're in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: No remote control with this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and hang. Wish there were compatible colored bulbs offered. No remote came with it and we have had no rain (western drought) so have not been able to test weatherproof. Certainly bright enough. May need more than one strand, depending on what you are trying to do, but this worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: NoCo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to a new house without lights at the patio. I bought one of these and I'm very pleasant with the light (900 lumens) enough for night barbecue. Compared with local Home Depot stuff, this one is more longer, more bulbs, led bulbs for less money and awesome quality of the bulbs and cord.
customer_reviews.author: AV maniac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews which said the 2 watt ones were bright and many people used them with a dimmer, which is great to have the 2 options. I chose to purchase the 1 watt ones for this area and it was the perfect amount of light. For our rear patio, I will probably purchase the longer 48" and get the 2 watt version with a separate dimmer, just in case we want to change the light level. This seems like a great, sturdy product! I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Monica Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This string of lights looks and feels extremely sturdy and durable. The 1W bulbs are very bright. Although the package doesn't indicate that the lights are dimmable, I put them on an outdoor dimmer and experienced no problems. The lights respond perfectly to the dimmer, with no flicker. I plan on buying another string.
customer_reviews.author: eagle60s

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lights!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at the value of this product. We hung these from an umbrella on our deck and it added ambiance to our deck. The lights were easy to install with just an outdoor extension cord. I actually used metal binder clips to hold the lights on. Then I just unclipped them to remove the lights from the umbrella at the end of the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Dougthedrummer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Even at 1W these are bright, so will be adding an inline dimmer to further reduce the brightness. But, quality product. We hung these with messenger cable and black zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These are great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! We replaced some patio lights that we also use as guidance lights along our driveway at night and these are awesome. They were a little brighter than I thought they were going to be but THAT is not an issue as some reviews have said. They are just the right amount of light, and I have these on for about 5 hours a night and no issues, even when it was -16° the other night! Snow, no problem! Rain No problem! i can't wait to sit on the patio and entertain our friends this next summer under these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Lorimar24

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We have spent years building and improving our patio. Providing lighting on the patio was a wonderful finishing touch. These lights were exactly what we wanted. The Edison bulbs provide a great ambience. The wiring is durable but not obtrusive. We spent about an hour installing them and used them two days later when we had a party.
customer_reviews.author: rdeank

customer_reviews.title: Great good quality lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent high quality lights. They are bright! I do recommend buying one of the dimmers if you plan to use them around the house. I have them around the house and around our horse pasture where we feed our horses so we can see to feed them when its dark. My recommendations to be sure to string a light metal cable to attach lights from. These are heavy. I used a small zip tie to connect them to the cable.
customer_reviews.author: mxdad

customer_reviews.title: Buy an extra pack of the bulbs just in case so you have them on hand
customer_reviews.text: This is my second string, the first one has been up for about 2 years already and I just added to it. These lights are awesome, very durable and have been through 3 hurricanes and only replaced a few of the bulbs over the years. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the patio
customer_reviews.text: These lights are a great addition to our patio. I joined the 48' and 24' strands. Knocked off 1 star because when I joined the 2 strands together, there was double the amount of space between the lights of the joined sections. Brightech should really be able to space the lights properly to be able to join together without 6' of wire. I highly recommend the dimmer, which I purchased. It is great to be able to have it well light when needed and then turn it down as needed. Plenty bright at just 1 watt. I wish the bulbs were shatter resistant, instead of glass but overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: kiniya girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ambient lighting
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a month and used them for three weekends at the campsite. Excellent lighting and dependability. I keep them in the camper and haven't had an issue with damaged lights or nonworking lights. They would be great for deck lighting or special occasion lighting in the yard or deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Rust

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are some heavy duty lights! Bright, clear, and industrial like an extension cord! There is no doubt that the cord will hold up. They look great on my apartment patio, and the dog even approves. Ha... Make sure if you are using hooks that they are larger than the standard size, you will need them. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: TheTravelGypsy

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable outdoor lighting
customer_reviews.text: While a little pricey (though not compared to home improvement store similar items), these are definitely "commercial grade" as advertised. Very durable cable with actual glass LED bulbs. 15 bulbs at 2w each means they're still only 30w total, and they light up my patio very well. I did not install with wire rope because I'm only going about nine feet between hooks, though admittedly this looks too symmetrical and not staggered enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Putz

customer_reviews.title: Great set but WOW are those bulbs fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great. Good price. I busted a bulb doing the install other than being VERY fragile they arent bad. It was impossible finding a replacement bulb at local home depot. So be careful with them. If you install them well they should be fine. If they fall it would not surprise me if every single bulb shatters. so 4 stars not five.
customer_reviews.author: JXD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My whole terrace is so bright, I love it!! We can continue to barbecue at night and sit outdoors in comfort. The lights were easy to put up and with the hole on top ,I was able to attach them to my terrace railings without any difficulty. Really over shadowed the other lights that was there and so I will be removing the old string and one string of these lights will be more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Bright and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I already had some incandescent string lights and I added these to the end of those. The light levels from these were higher but did not look different enough to feel out of place. I would definitely buy them again. In fact one of my friends asked me to get her some as a housewarming present.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie W. Korper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Lighting - Love My Outdoor Space
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, much better than those I have seen in retail stores. I purchased 3 and strung together with no problem. I purchased the 1 watt version and much brighter than expected. Provides more then sufficient light. My only complaint, there is a about a 3' lenth between plug and bulb (beginning and end) which means there is a 6' gap without bulb when stringing together. Simple fix was to remove the plug and hard wire the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Notts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to add Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights; they are truly commercial grade - heavy duty wire - and I'm very pleased with the look it adds to our patio. I like that the bulbs are LED so they are not hot and won't require replacement anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Blondy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few sets of these. They are brighter than I expected but I haven't felt the need to add a dimmer. They look great. I have them installed outside. It has rained a few times and I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Damp Squid

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issue with Light Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Just received these lights and was excited to get them up on the deck. Inserted all bulbs and the last one came out of the box with cloudy glass. Not acceptable. This is a simple items - lights. Disappointed that I am now going to have to go through the process of returning them just for one bulb. Will not order this brand again if they can't even guarantee the quality of their light bulbs out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ravenswood/Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: These are bright. They are perfect! Such a great buy. I wasted my time and money on others but my husband finally bought these and they are 1000 times better than the ones I got AtHome.
customer_reviews.author: Pep

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lights that I am going to string in the backyard. The one watt bulbs are just the perfect amount of light. I wanted something that was not too bright, but enough light too. The lights are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 24 ft led bistro lights and lit up my front yard garden. I liked them so much I bought another, and 2 of their 48 ft lights. The led lights look great even when not powered. A great atmosphere, it creates, yes. Very weather resistant, zero problems after 3 months outdoors, and zero problems expected for years or decades. Very well made and maintenance free product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I am sure they are great.
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was definitely a "my bad". I did not look closely enough at the lights and description when I ordered. These are definitely well made Commercial lights made to last. However, I just needed one season patio lights so they were returned. Should I ever need the other type, I would not hesitate to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few sets of these. They are brighter than I expected but I haven't felt the need to add a dimmer. They look great. I have them installed outside. It has rained a few times and I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Damp Squid

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great enough for Hurricane Michael?
customer_reviews.text: These as such good quality& very bright. We ordered an additional set after we were so pleased with the first set. One bulb broken in the box but not the fault of seller & I am sure we can find another one.. Anxious to return after evacuating FL to see if they survived Hurricane Michael.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product high-quality commercial grade light with LED ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product high-quality commercial grade light with LED bulbs included. I saw similar products on other internet sites that were much higher in price and didn't even include the bulbs or if they did they didn't offer LED bulbs BTW the LED bulbs in this product look like real filament style bulbs with a 10-watt equivalent brightness but only uses 1 watt of power.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They are elegant, weather proof and look fantastic. Other reviews had problem hanging them because of falling bulbs but I had my 16 year old son do it and never had this inside. We did 300 feet of them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny V

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, easy to install, survived the rains
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect length to complete the lighting of the deck railing as two 48 foot would have been too long. Would have liked to see a cap for the female end of the cord, so I made one. 10 watt equivalence for the bulb is just enough. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Passion4Diving

customer_reviews.title: Work Great, Even with Dimmer
customer_reviews.text: These lights have a heavy duty cord and well built connections. At only 1 watt per bulb, I didn't think we'd get much effect with a dimmer, but we added a dimmer switch to the circuit and they function great.
customer_reviews.author: Joejanney

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a little bright for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: The cord is heavy duty. The lights look nice, even when off. These have helped to make our outdoor area more usable during the dark winter months. I'm not exactly complaining, but I would join other voices in saying they are surprisingly bright. I wish they were dimmer, softer, "warmer". For an eating setting they are fab. For ambiance, you might want to see if there's something dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very well packaged. No broken bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them so I’m not gonna rate the “weatherproof” and “energy efficient” categories. They arrived very well packaged: each lightbulb wrapped individually. MUCH better and brighter than the $40 patio lights I bought at World Market. Buy with confidence. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Every thing I wanted in outdoor lights.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cord with water tight sockets. Should be good for at least 5 years. I bought another set. Coupled with an outdoor remote switch they are perfect. CAUTION: The bulbs are fragile so don't install them until lights are strung or at least laid out and ready to be strung. One bump on concrete and they are goners.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs explicitly state "1. Risk of electrical shock. Use in dry locations only" How do they sell these as outdoors with such a warning.....I guess good for outdoors if it never rains.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I just installed my lights and to clarify from different customers. I originally purchased two 48ft from Angroc and I was short 25ft on both sides. So I ordered the 24ft 1 watt bulbs. I was skeptical because from previous reviews saying that these are not dimmable. After installing them, I was so excited when they dimmed to every single setting the remote had from the original lights from Angroc. I’ll keep everyone posted. Here are some pics. Fire is not LED lol
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty , not all bulbs worked :/
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! Was excited about getting them hung up until we plugged them in and two bulbs was out ... still have 2 boxes that are 48ft and haven’t hung those yet... wish I could get bulbs replaced with the amount I spent...the lighting Ian perfect for what we needed..: sams club had some for just a few bucks more but was sold out in store ..
customer_reviews.author: Langford

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 6 months, half the string is burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in both the day time and night time. I wish it came with some sort switch or controller, as I had to buy it separately, but not a big deal. Price is competitive for the most part-- wish it was cheaper, but it's a good buy. I ended up buying another strand because I thought one would be enough. So just make sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jax L.

customer_reviews.title: Bright for just 15 watts of usage. Great for patios and decks.
customer_reviews.text: Low wattage but bright enough for nighttime conversations. Lights were warm and illuminate/look just like incandescent. 15 watts for 15 lights is amazing and at 45 feet was just the right size to hang around my side yard deck. Wiring was beefy and rugged, built to last. My only nit was some of the bulbs were incredibly hard to get screwed into the socket sufficiently enough to light up. Took several attempts before I got all 15 lights working. That said, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: starg39

customer_reviews.title: LED lights for the incandescent price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Perfect length for my application. I used cup hooks to attach the lights below my eaves. I needed an extension cord to make the run to the power outlet but that was trivial. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: John V Magisano

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: The quality for the string light is good and looks great in my yard. Just a reminder that it's not very light weighted, so that you need to buy extra hanging strings. There is no rain in my area yet, so I can not judge how good waterproofing it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Bright, beautiful, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We just put them up last night and they seem to be working great! They are surprisingly bright and light up the back yard very well, no more eating in the dark when we host bbqs! Little hint to others though, don't screw in the light bulbs too tight or they will not light up. Over all very happy with the quality and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Kier

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive a remote control (review asked me to grade it) but I was not expecting it. That lights do the trick! Very happy with them. They light up the back patio nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: High quality Products
customer_reviews.text: These lights go along the outlines of our Chicken Coops. I bought the hooks to hang them and the remote control dimmer and the set up is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best by far! I have tried a lot of them!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the best lights out there. I've tried quite a few and these held up to every standard that I required and wanted. And they even have an incredible customer service team that helped me with everything that I needed thank you Lauren!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynn

customer_reviews.title: These are SOO nice! Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: These are SOO nice! Happy with the product, the shipping, and will order more when needed! We hung ours under our carport and they provide just the right amount of light. The LED bulbs make a warm welcome!
customer_reviews.author: shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Perks up our lanai out back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some that I had bought that were solar. Solar just doesn't work as well. Isn't as bright Weren't as sturdy. These are really bright! My husband got them installed with cup-hooks in about an hour. They bring a lot of ambiance to the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great installment tip
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality product as advertised! Everything perfect out of box. All 15 1watt bulbs worked perfectly. High light output but not unpleasantly bright; beautiful bulbs. I came up with an idea that works perfectly to protect bulbs while hanging or installing. After hand tightening all bulbs and testing, unplug cord and reinsert installed bulbs back in bubble wrap sleeves and boxes. Tape with piece of scotch tape the long tongue on box to wire T. Remove after each bulb installed. One happy camper!!😀
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Peters

customer_reviews.title: Love our new lights!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a pergola a few weeks ago and wanted lights. These are perfect. Just enough bulbs and I love the Edison bulb look. Just perfect for our use. Love they are waterproof and can withstand winds to 50 mph. Service and price was great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Lighting up the campground woods.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy gauge wire which I am sure will stand up to weather and the elements. As stated by other reviewers, the bulbs are very bright (one watt each). This will work out very well as I am going to string two sets of them across the property, which is very dark. July: Installed strings. They work wonderfully. I placed these lights across the Camp Ground, near the river and docks. The darkest area at night and strung them at approx. 9 foot high. They worked great. They balanced out the property and I have the nicest campground around. Note: I broke one of the bulbs while putting them together. You might order an extra one just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights!
customer_reviews.text: We used these to hang from our RV awning. I was afraid the 1W light would be dim, but they were plenty bright. Bulbs seem to be pretty well made, the strands are quite heavy and appear to be very durable. I had no issues with bulbs on delivery- all worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lights&Lighting

customer_reviews.title: Love our lights
customer_reviews.text: We did not put them outside so I am not sure about the Weatherproof. We have them installed in our church fellowship space and they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ren P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Brightech String Lights to replace an outdoor stand lamp. I was very pleased with the quality and brightness of the lights, they light up my entire patio. I would definitely buy this product again, and highly recommend these lights to anyone looking for outdoor lights with great quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS DIPRENDA

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great quality, but the bulbs were way too bright for any sort of outdoor ambiance. Ended up spending another $50 on replacement bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Arsoth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & safe for outdoor lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights are heavy duty & made for outdoors. Also I don’t worry about a fire starting. I purchased a remote & the combination is perfect. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We use these inside our church building. I think it makes the room feel like something out of Stars Hollow, and we get a lot of compliments on the cozy atmosphere. They are really bright. We bought more strands, but it only took a few to get the lighting we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: H A Truett

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I use them to hang around the exterior of my concession trailer. They look great and are really of excellent quality. I recently bought another string.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Always wanting the most for my dollar
customer_reviews.text: The brightest ambience pro lights are extremely well designed. I’m very pleased with my purchase. I was extremely impressed with the construction and design. The use of standard gauge extension cord wire between each LED light socket. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: funtime

customer_reviews.title: Great string lights
customer_reviews.text: We installed these string lights above the fire pit area and they look amazing. These are professional grade and very blight. We have to add wires to make it more secure and also added dimmer to control the brightness. I wish there are more options on length so we can pick and choose the length fit to the projects. We like it so much we are getting ready to add more lights to the patio, too.
customer_reviews.author: doggie lover

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but not enough ambience
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - The construction is solid and heavy-duty. - The lights can be hooked up end-to-end to extend the strand length. Cons: - I was looking for something very soft and amber colored, but these are much brighter and bluer than shown in the pictures. - The lights are more spaced out than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nina P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lights!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights with bright LED bulbs. Nice to have a short set to complete my porch. Be careful that these are 3 ft apart and many big box store lights are 2 feet. But excellent product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: losencinias

customer_reviews.title: Good as always
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying these lights. The 1st ones were for the back patio. I installed these lights on the side of my barn. They look great & are good quality! I installed them on a timer so they come on for a few hours each night at sunset.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: very well made... was noit observant i ...
customer_reviews.text: very well made...was noit observant i guess...only 7 lights in 24 ft...not what i wanted. returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Alan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Research paid off, great product
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be very good quality and quite please with the purchase. Knew going in that the 3 foot spacing of the sockets wasn’t going to be adequate for our application so we bought the 48 foot long string and doubled them up, going down and then back in a straight run, ultimately getting the sockets on an 18” on center spacing. Worked out perfectly. Have had several friends over who have enquired where they can get some for their own place.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They were very easy to put up! And at night they give a very nice evening glow . The Hummingbirds love them to, as they can eat later into the evening. And I love the look and shape of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Fernetta Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Improve quality control
customer_reviews.text: The idea of using LED light bulb is good. For decorative is bright enough but if for backyard light source, 7 light bulbs are not enough. After I hung the lights 2 bulbs immediately failed. 2 days later 2 more were ready show deteriorating. Please check the bulbs before you send them out. It will be nice to have couple of spares just in case. The replacement arrived in a short 3 days was efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights have been the perfect addition to our patio. They are well made, heavy duty, and the illumination is perfect. We are very happy that they are LED- the illuminated bulbs give the perfect amount of light. We are in love with our new patio lights!
customer_reviews.author: Kennethjohnsonart

customer_reviews.title: Very Fragile Bulbs - $$$ $ to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly because I purchased from Amazon Warehouse Deals .. Brightech said my warranty is void... They replied quickly and said I could purchase more of their bulbs at 8 dollars/bulb to replace and they would be warrantied... The string itself seems sturdy, they look great and low wattage bulbs for night time use however, a word to the wise.. the bulbs are VERY FRAGILE - several broken after 2 months of use - a small bump against a porch or railing will break the bulb. Seems strange that they would be so fragile for outdoor use. Out of the window for return :(
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: They Look Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. My only issue is that one of the lights broke when I started installing them ( a fault of my own ) and you can't order just one or two lights to replace. You have to order 15 of them. Overall I'm very happy with this set!
customer_reviews.author: LD Burton

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights
customer_reviews.text: We bough two strands to enhance the lighting on our new patio. The soft glow is perfect and gives plenty of light to create the perfect atmosphere
customer_reviews.author: J Sims

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for these great LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Robust strand of lights that went up easily even with tight wire support (each socket comes with pass through eye). On all night right out of the box and expect them to last for many years. Probably the best lights for this use out on the market. Definitely the best value!
customer_reviews.author: CesarB

customer_reviews.title: Well built, solid lighting.
customer_reviews.text: These lights provide a pleasant background light to our deck which was what we wanted. They are very well built. They have small loops of plastic at the socket for every bulb, which makes hanging them very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great lights. But...
customer_reviews.text: The lights are beautiful. However, one socket does not work despite trying several bulbs in it. Unfortunate due to delay on our gazebo installation we could not hang the lights until the return had expired, so we are living with them. The lights are sturdy and lovely otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I hung them in my bedroom on the wall behind my bed. Makes it cozier and the light is not too strong that I can't fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs are not close together like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The picture is mis leading the bulbs are not that close together. They are pretty far apart.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette macias

product_meta.title: Brightech Ambience Pro - Waterproof LED Outdoor String Lights - Hanging 1W Vintage Edison Bulbs Create Bistro Ambience On Your Gazebo - 48 Ft Commercial Grade Cafe Lights, Dimmable
feature_bullets: PATIO LIGHTS WITH EDISON FILAMENT BULBS CREATE GREAT VINTAGE "ITALIAN STYLE" BISTRO AMBIENCE: String Brightech Ambience Pro market lights on a pergola to set the mood in your patio. These Edison strings with exposed filaments give off a warm glow reminiscent of old world bistros The lights are bright enough to BBQ by without a flashlight, but dim enough not to overwhelm. Perfect for entertaining or a romantic dinner!.

USE DECORATIVE CAFE LIGHTS AKA PERGOLA LIGHTS FOR A BEAUTIFUL LIGHT CANOPY : Use vintage bistro lights for a light canopy at your wedding reception, birthday party, or other event. You can also string them straight, or wrap them in trees for unique shapes. Increasingly popular as indoor lighting too, for bedrooms, bars and restaurants. --- Bulb Spacing: 3 Feet. --- Connections: Up to 8 strands total..---

HEAVY DUTY, COMMERCIAL GRADE WEATHERPROOF STRAND LIGHTS FOR YOUR EXTERIOR: These lights are waterproof and have withstood winds blowing at 50 MPH, per reviews! Industrial grade WeatherTite Technology by Brightech makes Ambience Pros durable. UL listed, and the rubberized, flexible cord is thicker than a traditional rope. Confidently leave these lights on display year round.

15 ENERGY SAVING, BALCONY LIGHTS THAT PLUG IN: Festoon your deck with the best LED carnival lights to save you money on your electric bill. They are high efficiency 1 watt LED standard base bulbs. Our LED lights are approved for residential and commercial lighting and they never get hot even after being on for hours. (Please NOTE- Made for use with 110v.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,124 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
